img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat in a barren, rocky landscape. The character is performing an action, possibly an attack or dodge, while facing an enemy labeled "Second Rat Prince," whose health bar is visible at the bottom of the screen. The environment is desolate, with dead trees and scattered debris. The interface shows various icons and bars indicating the player's health, abilities, and controls. The text "Pa! Papa!" appears at the bottom, suggesting dialogue or an exclamation related to the ongoing battle.
